User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user within the AccessFlow application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity, same as Firebase Auth UID.

avatarId.description: Identifier for the user's avatar image.

role.description: Role of the user in the system.

departmentId.description: The ID of the department the user belongs to.

Department.title: Department
Department.description: Represents a department (group) within the organization.

id.description: Unique identifier for the department entity.

AccessRequest.title: AccessRequest
AccessRequest.description: Represents a user's request for access to a system, data, or other resource.

id.description: Unique identifier for the access request entity.

userId.description: ID of the user who created the request.

departmentId.description: ID of the department for which the request is made.

description.description: User's justification for the access request.

requestType.description: Type of access requested (e.g., System, Data, Other).

status.description: Current status of the access request.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the request was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the request was last updated.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles. The {userId} corresponds to the Firebase Auth UID.

/accessRequests/{accessRequestId}.description: Stores all access requests from all users.
